= Rough Requirements =

M3 will run as an application on a web page, inside a {{{<canvas>}}} element.

The top level subsystems, or modules, will include:

  * Domain objects: player, fortress, monkey, weapon, launcher, etc.
  * Physics: collision detection, trajectory computation
  * Graphics: sprites, background images, animation engine
  * Sound (hopefully native JavaScript, might have to go to Flash)
  * Game logic: turn taking, scoring
  * Persistence: database
  * Service layer: to interact with the database
